channel.title: Journal on Articles
channel.description: Recent content in Journal on Articles

item.title: Multilingual Development: an english perspective
item.description: Throughout my career I’ve been afforded the opportunity to work with many people of various dialects of English. On many occasions the persons I’ve worked with do not speak “American” English as a first language. In this article I highlight some things which may help with persons who are trying to communicate across English dialect barriers. However, this article is not about communication through translation -but this perspective may be useful nonetheless.
